content.text: Good! Just got back from a fun hike in the redwoods with my dad.
That sounds amazing! I love hiking. I would love to go to Japan some day.
Japan is amazing! I spent a year there studying and traveling. I love the culture.
I can imagine. I've heard the food is amazing too.
It is! My favorite dish is takoyaki.
I'm not familiar with that. What is it?
It's a ball made of dough, filled with octopus and topped with a special sauce, bonito flakes and dried seaweed.
That sounds delicious! I'm definitely going to have to try that someday.
You definitely should! It's a classic Japanese street food.
What else did you do while you were in Japan?
I went to a lot of temples and shrines. I also saw some amazing traditional performances.
That sounds really cool. I've always wanted to see a traditional Japanese performance.
It's really something special. I'm glad I got to experience it.
Me too. I'm sure I'll be dreaming of takoyaki and traditional Japanese performances for weeks!
Haha! I'm glad I could give you something to look forward to.
